name: Collapse a LD JAM 42 Game
description: This is a game made for the LD Jam 42. It is based on the theme of running out of space. The game is a 2D platformer and my inspiration for making this game came from several classical DS games. The game may be a little buggy as it is only the 2nd platformer I made. Some may cringe at the animation and art style but hey give me credit at least I tried. :)  Anyway hope you enjoy the game and thanks for checking it out. Have fun! ;)
